name: The Spyer's
description: Your placed in the 1960s, in soviet russia and you're playing as an undercover detective. Your goal is to find and kill the Spyer's in a buildings. You have to find intel and information about them. You can also play the Survive Mode, your goal is just to kill the enemies and earn money from them, and then with that money, you can buy weapons (its still work on progress, so there might be bugs and glitches you might encounter). Good luck...
